data.title: Fort Myers Theatre to present ‘The DROWSY Chaperone’
meta_keywords: Fort Myers Theatre to present 'The DROWSY Chaperone'
data.meta_description: Fort Myers Theatre proudly presents The DROWSY Chaperone at 16120 San Carlos Blvd. Suite 5, starting on Feb. 22 and running on specific dates through M
data.text:
Fort Myers Theatre proudly presents The DROWSY Chaperone at 16120 San Carlos Blvd. Suite 5, starting on Feb. 22 and running on specific dates through March 3.

The DROWSY Chaperone is a musical comedy about a man who is reminiscing about life. He pulls out a rare recording of a fictional 1928 musical and as he listens, the characters and story come to life in his living room. Directed and choreographed by Robin Dawn. This is a night of music, dancing, and laughter that lovers of Broadway will not want to miss.

Tickets are priced from $25 to $40 and on sale at FMTix.com.

Fort Myers Theatre is a local community theater that gives local talent a place to shine and theatergoers a place to relax and enjoy a night out at the theater.
